data.oai_dc:dc: Year 2009, 15 minute measurements of stage, water temperature in a small headwater stream draining draining a mainly wetland catchment (49% wetlands/swamp + 36% forest), Bear Br., draining Cedar Swamp, Reading, MA.

Continuous measurements, every 15 minutes, were made of stage and water temperature in a small headwater stream draining a mainly wetland catchment (49% wetland + 36% wetland). Discharge is determined from stage using discharge vs stage regressions.
PIE LTER|disturbance|Cedar Swamp|Bear Br|wetland|discharge|water temperature|water stage
